column1: S234AO.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S234AO.DECK.  234. SURVEY NUMBER
S234AO.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S234AO.FORM.  1. A - ENLISTED MEN 2. FORM A - OFFICERS 3. FORM B - ENLISTED MEN 4. FORM B - OFFICERS
S234AO.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. FLIGHT OFFICER OR WARRANT OFFICER 2. SECOND LIEUTENANT 3. FIRST LIEUTENANT 4. CAPTAIN 5. MAJOR 6. LIEUTENANT COLONEL 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT GRAD?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q3. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20 TO 24 YEARS 3. 25 TO 29 YEARS 4. 30 TO 34 YEARS 5. 35 YEARS OR OLDER 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q4. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR AWHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT CAME INTO THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q6. IN WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIM?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q7. IN WHICH OF THE ARMY FORCES DID YOU SERVE FOR THE LONGEST PERIOD OF TIM?  1. ARMY AIR FORCES 2. ARMY GROUND FORCES 3. ARMY SERVICE FORCES 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q8A. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED 3. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 4. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q8B. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. HAVE ONE CHILD 2. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 3. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 4. HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. I'M NOT MARRIED 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q10A. HAVE YOU SERVED OUTSIDE THE CONTINENTAL UNITED STATES IN THIS WA?  1. YES 2. NO
S234AO.Q10B. IF YES, HOW LONG DID YOU SERVE OVERSEA?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q10C. IF YES, HAVE YOU BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT IN THIS WA?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 11A, 11B AND 12 NOT CODED.

S234AO.Q13. HAS THE ARMY AT ANY TIME CLASSIFIED YOU AS A LIMITED SERVICE MA?  1. YES, I WAS CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 2. NO, I WAS NEVER CLASSIFIED AS LIMITED SERVICE BY THE ARMY 3. I DON'T KNOW WHETHER THE ARMY HAS EVER CLASSIFIED ME AS LIMITED SERVICE OR NOT 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q14A. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, ARE YOU NOW CLASSIFIED BY THE ARMY AS PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q14B. IN YOUR OWN OPINION, ARE YOU PHYSICALLY FIT FOR OVERSEAS DUT?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q15. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 16 NOT CODED.

S234AO.Q17. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM?  1. ON A FARM 2. IN THE COUNTRY BUT NOT ON A FARM 3. IN A VILLAGE WITH FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE 4. IN A SMALL CITY WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE 5. IN A CITY WITH BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE 6. IN A LARGE CITY WITH MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q18. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WERE YOU DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARM? (CHECK AS MANY AS YOU WERE DOING JUST BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY.)  1. WORKING FULL-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER, FOR SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION 2. GOING TO FULL-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 3. FARMING (EITHER WITH YOUR FAMILY OR FOR YOURSELF) 4. HAD MY OWN BUSINESS (DID NOT RECEIVE SALARY, WAGES OR COMMISSION) 5. LOOKING FOR A JOB 6. WORKING PART-TIME FOR AN EMPLOYER 7. GOING TO PART-TIME SCHOOL OR COLLEGE 8. SOMETHING ELSE (EDITED TO LIST, NOT CONSIDERED ONE OF A DOUBLE CHECK) 9. I WAS IN THE REGULAR ARMY 0. DOUBLE CHECKS X. QUESTION 19 NOT CODED.

S234AO.Q20. WHETHER YOU ARE A CHURCH MEMBER OR NOT, DO YOU CONSIDER YOURSELF:  1. CATHOLIC 2. JEWISH 3. PROTESTANT (FOR EXAMPLE, BAPTIST, METHODIST ETC.) 4. OTHER (FOR EXAMPLE, MORMON, OTHODOX, JEHOVAH'S WITNESSES, AGNOSTIC, ETC.) 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART I***************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THE ARMY DISCHARGE PLAN:

S234AO.Q21. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q22. IN YOUR OPINION, IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO B?  1. YES, I THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 2. NO, I DON'T THINK IT IS BEING CARRIED OUT THE WAY IT WAS SUPPOSED TO BE 3. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT THE PLAN TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q23. HERE ARE FOUR STATEMENTS OF OPINION ABOUT THE POINT SYSTEM. CHECK THE ONE WHICH COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OPINION.  1. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 2. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 3. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, BUT THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT WELL 4. THE POINT SYSTEM ITSELF WAS NOT A GOOD IDEA, AND THE ARMY IS CARRYING IT OUT BADLY 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q24. IN YOUR OPINION, HOW HARD IS THE ARMY TRYING TO SPEED UP THE DISCHARGE OF ENLISTED ME?  1. THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. THE ARMY IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. THE ARMY IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q25. HAVE YOU HEARD OR READ ANYTHING ABOUT THE POSSIBILITY OF THE FOLLOWING CHANGE BEING MADE IN THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN - ALL ENLISTED MEN WITH TWO YEARS OR MORE SERVICE TO BE DISCHARGED IN THE NEAR FUTURE, REGARDLESS OF HOW MANY POINTS THEY HAV?  1. YES, I HAVE HEARD OF THIS 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HEARD OF THIS BEFORE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER P. THE ARMY AIR FORCES HAS ANNOUNCED THAT THE FOLLOWING MEN IN THE A.A.F. ARE ELIGIBLE FOR SEPARATION: ENLISTED MEN NOW IN THE U.S. WHO HAVE 45 POINTS AND 2 YEARS OR MORE OF SERVICE, PROVIDED THEY DO NOT HAVE A CRITICAL MOS. ENLISTED MEN NOW IN THE U.S. WITH 42 MONTHS OR MORE OF SERVICE, REGARDLESS OF THEIR POINT SCORE.
S234AO.Q26A. DID YOU KNOW ABOUT THIS DISCHARGE PLAN FOR THE ARMY AIR FORCES - WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM THE DISCHARGE PLAN FOR OTHER SOLDIER?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q26B. DO YOU APPROVE OR DISAPPROVE OF THIS DISCHARGE PLAN FOR THE ARMY AIR FORCE?  1. I APPROVE 2. I DISAPPROVE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q27. NOW THAT THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF ARMY TRAINING OR SHOULD WE GO BACK TO THE REGULAR ARMY SYSTEM OF TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONL?  1. DRAFT ALL YOUNG MEN FOR A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING 2. GO BACK TO TAKING VOLUNTEERS ONLY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER *****************************PART II*************************** P. THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE BY DIFFERENT SOLDIERS ABOUT THE ARMY: READ EACH STATEMENT CAREFULLY. YOU WILL FIND THAT YOU AGREE WITH SOME AND DISAGREE WITH OTHERS. IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU AGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD AGREE. IF, ON THE WHOLE, YOU DISAGREE WITH A STATEMENT, CHECK THE WORD DISAGREE. THERE ARE NO RIGHT OR WRONG ANSWERS. THE ONLY ANSWER TO GIVE IS YOUR OWN HONEST OPINION.
S234AO.Q1. "THE HARDER A MAN WORKS IN THE ARMY, THE BETTER CHANCE HE HAS OF SUCCEEDING*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q2. "PROMOTION IN THE ARMY IS BASED ON WHAT YOU KNOW AND NOT WHO YOU KNOW*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q3. "IT IS ALL RIGHT FOR A SOLDIER TO ,GOLDBRICK,, IF IT DOESN'T MAKE MORE WORK FOR THE REST OF THE MEN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q4. "THE LONGER A MAN STAYS IN THE FIGHTING, THE WORSE HE BECOMES AS A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q5. "IT IS WRONG FOR A SOLDIER TO BREAK ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS EVEN IF HE DOESN'T GET CAUGHT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q6. "ON THE WHOLE, I THINK THE ARMY HAS HURT ME MORE THAN IT HAS HELPED ME*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q7. "THE AIR FORCE HAS NOT RECEIVED TOO GREAT A SHARE OF CREDIT FROM THE PUBLIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q8. "THE BEST WAY TO GET MOST SOLDIERS TO BEHAVE IS TO PUNISH THEM EVERYTIME THEY DON'T BEHAVE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q9. "THERE'S NOTHING IN CIVILIAN LIFE THAT CAN COMPARE WITH THE FEELING OF COMRADESHIP ONE GETS IN THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q10. "THE ARMY WOULD BE A LOT WORSE IF OFFICERS AND ENLISTED MEN WERE MORE FRIENDLY WITH EACH OTHER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q11. "DISCIPLINE IN THE ARMY IS NOT TOO STRICT AND MOST OF IT IS NECESSARY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q12. "THE ARMY SHOULD NOT HOLD MORE MILITARY PARADES AND CEREMONIES*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q13. "ON THE WHOLE, THE ARMY HAS AWARDED DECORATIONS FAIRLY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q14. "MILITARY COURTESY DOES NOT BUILD UP A SOLDIER'S RESPECT FOR HIS OFFICERS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q15. "THE LONGER A MAN HAS BEEN IN COMBAT, THE LESS PRIDE HE HAS IN HIS OUTFIT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q16. "TOO MANY OFFICERS TAKE UNFAIR ADVANTAGE OF THEIR RANK AND PRIVILEGES*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q17. "MOST SOLDIERS LOSE RESPECT FOR A MAN WHO IS ALWAYS BUCKING FOR PROMOTION*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q19. "TRAINING IN MILITARY COURTESY IS VERY USEFUL TO A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q20. "AN ENLISTED MAN IS USUALLY MORE CONCERNED WITH WHAT HIS OFFICERS THINK OF HIM THAN WITH WHAT THE OTHER ENLISTED MEN IN HIS OUTFIT THINK*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q21. "YOU CAN'T TRUST THE ARMY TO KEEP A PROMISE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q22. "THE ARMY IS TOO UNDEMOCRATIC*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q23. "MOST M.P.,S TREAT SOLDIERS UNFAIRLY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q24. "I'D RATHER HAVE A GOOD JOB IN A LOUSY OUTFIT THAN A LOUSY JOB IN A GOOD OUTFIT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q25. "THE ARMY DOES NOT PLACE TOO MUCH IMPORTANCE ON ,SPIT AND POLISH,*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q27. "MY EXPERIENCES IN THE ARMY HAVE INCREASED MY FAITH IN GOD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q28. "ONCE A MAN IS IN COMBAT, IT WOULDN'T BOTHER HIS PRIDE OR SELF-RESPECT TO GET OUT OF THE OUTFIT IF HE COULD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q69. "WHILE THE BATTLE IS GOING ON, IT IS VERY HARD TO TELL HOW WELL A MAN PERFORMS AS A COMBAT SOLDIER*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q72. "WHEN A SOLDIER IS IN COMBAT, THE THING THAT DOES MOST TO KEEP HIM FIGHTING IS THINKING OF WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO HIM IF HE QUITS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q80. "ONE OF THE MAIN REASONS PARATROOPERS GET SUCH HIGH RESPECT IS BECAUSE THEY ALL VOLUNTEERED FOR THE JOB*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q81. "I AM GOING TO MISS THE OLD GANG OF FELLOWS IN MY OUTFIT WHEN I LEAVE THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q82. "I GET ANGRY MORE QUICKLY NOW THAN I DID BEFORE I CAME INTO THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q83. "MOST OF THE TIME I FELT THAT IT DIDN'T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE WHETHER I DID MY ARMY JOB WELL OR NOT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q84. "AS A RESULT OF MY ARMY EXPERIENCES, I AM WILLING TO DO A LOT OF THINGS NOW THAT I USED TO THINK IT WAS MORALLY WRONG TO DO*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q85. "WHEN THE ARMY SAYS IT WILL DO SOMETHING THAT THE MEN WANT, MOST OF THE TIME IT ENDS UP BY NOT REALLY DOING IT*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q86. "A SOLDIER WHO HAS SEEN A LOT OF THE WAR HAS NO RIGHT TO GET SORE WHENEVER HE IS ANNOYED BY A PERSON WHO DIDN'T GO THROUGH WHAT HE DID*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S234AO.Q87. "I DRINK MORE NOW THAN I DID BEFORE I ENTERED THE ARMY*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S234AO.Q88. "ONE GOOD THING ABOUT THE ARMY IS THE FACT THAT YOU DON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT WHAT OTHER PEOPLE THINK OF YOU*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER ****************************PART III**************************** P. HERE ARE SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT SEVERAL DIFFERENT TOPICS:

S234AO.Q1. IN GENERAL, HOW DO YOU THINK MOST NON-COMS TEND TO LOOK AT THINGS - FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW OR THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIE?  1. FROM THE OFFICER'S POINT OF VIEW 2. FROM THE ENLISTED MAN'S POINT OF VIEW 0. NO ANSWER
